(english by google ) :

Hi, and thanks to a tour (even out of curiosity) on my map ... 

The theme of my lasergames always inspire (3 map 1.6 on this theme but not mid online). 

And with plugs as the effect MB_Tracer record is impeccable style on the map! (See laser you pass under the nose ... a must!) 

Otherwise, this is my first map on source and there is insufficient time to the pofiner ... If its interest I have the original file on my PC) 

N'Ã©siter has not give your opinion. 

Otherwise the map starts with CT and Terro in the same room but separated by an impenetrable wall transparent by the bullets and players. 

You must then direct you in a room to get the P90 and kevlar (with the gun). 

You then lead to a staircase that descends 2 storeys before you find in the labyrinth TK has the opposing Terrorist course. 

The door closes behind you and impossible to retrieve ... We must now confront the enemy! 

Of course, if ever there are AFK, a button located in the middle of the map can kill them ... 

Voilou! Enjoy!

PS : I FORGOT TEXTURE IN FIRST *.RAR ... IT'S GOOD NOW ... SORRY FOR MY FIRST UPLOAD ...
